title: Claiming Sunshine
description: Feeling stuck in an unhappy marriage Nikki finds herself being saved by an MC President. She finds herself in situations that she had only watched on TV. How exciting for her until reality hits her hard. Will she lose her kids, her life, herself? It all becomes too much but he won't let her go or so she thought.  This is a fun and exciting story about a Mom who finds a new way of life whether she wants it or not.
author: S.E. Leonard
